phrases: I went over to Toru's place for the first time yesterday.
So how did it go with him?!
We did not do anything like that, jeez.
But he is got like, a massive TV mounted to the wall,
and loads of spare rooms on the second and third floors of his house...
I thought he was a poor plebian like me!
Yeah, I forgot to pre-order one this year.
We should be able to handle it.
We do not take that many pre-orders, so we are not swamped or anything.
What kind of cake do you want?
Ooh, can I get one with tons of whipped cream?
I invited Yuna-chan over for Christmas!
So we will have you, Yuna-chan, Miyamura...
Wait, is he going to be able to come?
You would better invite him over.
Hell, I do not care if you cannot make it, but Miyamura better be here.
Sounds like you might be sleeping in a manger on Christmas.
I will probably be really busy helping out at the shop from the 23rd on.
But if I get time, I will definitely come over!
It is okay, you do not have to squeeze in time for me.
Once we eat dinner, we are basically done anyway.
You are not coming for Christmas, Miyamura-kun?!
I already have lots of work waiting for me at home today.
You are not coming for Christmas?!
You know he is dating me, right?
You know how up until recently, I had a crush on Hori?
I thought he gave up on her ages ago.
And you know how there was the whole thing with Kono-san?
Why does he think we know this?
I have no idea what that whole thing even was.
And Yoshikawa and I are definitely more than just friends,
but I am not going to start dating her or anything.
I thought they were already dating.
See, I thought that is how you would react!
I thought you thought I thought they were already dating!
Stop thinking, you are going to give Iura-kun an aneurism!
Well, okay, but... do not you have a crush on her?
How are you not embarrassed to admit that out loud?
I mean, do you guys think this is weird?
I do not think it is weird, I am just surprised.
But, like, should not you be more concerned about what she thinks of you,
rather than what we think of you?
If you two are happy with your current relationship, then that is fine.
It is not my place to say whether it is right or not.
Advice sure sounds different when it is coming from a master romancer.
When was I ever a master romancer?!
Can I come by your place to play video games today?
I want to finish the game we started before.
Yeah, sure, you can come over.
Yeah, sure, you can come over.
No, I do not have plans.
It is fine if today's not a good day!
It was going to happen sooner or later...
Sheesh, I never get used to how huge your house is.
Why are you being so quiet?
C'mon, Yoshikawa, let us get upstairs.
Ugh, why is this hallway so long?!
Oh, maybe his mom or dad are home...
And he does not want me to meet them?
I wish I were a hot guy.
I mean, if I were, you would not...
W-Wait, why are you locking the door?
Wh-Why are you loosening your tie?!
I mean, I always take my tie off when I get home.
I am not going to try anything weird with you,
but I do not want you to be uncomfortable in here.
I have no idea what I did wrong.
I am not uncomfortable or scared or anything.
Why are you closing the door on me?
Why are you closing the door on me?
Do you have a friend over?
Oh, then let me get you two some drinks!
She is blocking it with her foot.
Come now, do not be rude to your guest!
I can leave if I should not be here, Toru!
Let me go get you some.
I told you, we are good!
I will go get that for you.
And do not barge in without knocking.
Were not you going to go get us some cake?!
She helps out around the house.
She always bombards me with questions about you.
-Like, Who were you walking with the other day?
-Like, Who were you walking with the other day?
Who is that girl you are always inviting over?
Which would you like, shortcake or cheesecake?
Toru-kun, try anything funny, and I will tell your mother.
I am not going to try anything now that I know you are here, Yashiro-san!
She is all excited'because I brought a girl over.
I am not going to try anything now that I know you are here, Yashiro-san!
I am not going to try anything now that I know you are here, Yashiro-san!
S-So if she was not here, he would have t-t-t-t-
Something is setting you off again!
Do not just stare at me!
You are here to play video games, right?
I am going to beat it today!
I am happy with the way things are.
The cakes from this bakery are great!
The cakes from this bakery are great!
You are coming over on Christmas, right?
Cannot you come over to my place?
I want to hang in my room.
That must have been shocking to hear.
Knock some damn sense into him!
Hold on, let us hear why he does not want to go.
If you knew what it was like, you would understand!
I do not even want to talk about it, but here goes!
The mantis is going to stare at me!
The mantis is going to stare at me!
You had your end-of-semester assembly today, right?
She is got A's in everything except Art and P.E.!
Kyoko's a smarty-pants like her dad.
Well, I really hate to agree with you,
but yes, I suppose she does take after you in math.
This is such an emotional moment!
-Hey, Yuri-chan, I asked you a question.
-Hey, Yuri-chan, I asked you a question.
The next time you get your grades, you will be graduating!
-You failed tons of tests at the start of your senior year.
-You failed tons of tests at the start of your senior year.
-Starting this April, I will not be in high school anymore.
-You failed tons of tests at the start of your senior year.
-Starting this April, I will not be in high school anymore.
-Your memory for petty details is one thing I really dislike about you.
I wonder what I will be doing around this time next year.
After I graduate... what will my life be like?
-Wait, you just said we were both good at math!
-Wait, you just said we were both good at math!
That is a huge Christmas tree...
Watch where you are going, or you will trip and fall.
Oh, you are Yoshikawa-san's older sister!
You are not wearing your glasses today.
I should think about getting contacts.
Would you like me to buy you some?
It is a little weird for a high-school kid to buy a college student contacts.
You are wearing a suit today.
Yeah, I am interviewing for jobs.
Meanwhile, my dumbass sister spends all her time screwing around.
It is funny because it is true.
She is dumber than a bag of rocks.
Want me to go buy some dessert?
Get out of the way, dude!
How am I supposed to watch TV?!
The hell kind of tone is that?!
I do not care if you are my brother, you are dead!
And put your gross tissues in the trash can, you dumbass!
Keep your germs away from me!
Wow, look at all this food!
Come now, the bugs are not that bad.
You are meeting Remi at seven, right?
You spending Christmas by yourself, Sakura?
How am I supposed to eat dinner after coming face-to-face with those bugs?!
How am I supposed to eat dinner after coming face-to-face with those bugs?!
You are not eating dinner with the bugs.
You are eating dinner with Remi.
Maybe I will repeat a year and stay back.
Hurry up and graduate already, Koichi.
It is your job to bring'i am over here anyways.
And what, ruin their Christmas sales?
Oh, he is going to come drop off our cake, though.
Do you think he will come in?
I do not know, he will probably stay at the front door.
I-I am not sad about it, if you are worried!
We are all sad about it.
Sorry, I cannot stay at all.
Get in here and warm up!
I will get you a warm drink!
O-Okay, but I have to leave right after I drink it.
This is a whole lot different from last year.
I, uh... really have to go now.
I, uh... really have to go now.
It is so quiet with all the snow.
We have got a while, do not we?
I still do not know that much about you, Miyamura.
There is tons I do not know.
I do not know very much about you.
I want to be with you,
I-I mean, if that is okay.
I said, I will make you happy, Miyamura!
Is not the guy supposed to say that to the girl?!
It does not make sense that way!
I am self-centered, and all I am good at is studying and chores!
I am self-centered, and all I am good at is studying and chores!
And I am not nice to people, either!
So you cannot be the one saying it!
I do not think that is how it works, but okay.
I look forward to our future together.
Sorry, I got to head back to the shop!
Next Time: I Would Gift You the Sky
Do you go to the shrine on New Year's every year?
Only when it gets less crowded.
Want To go together this year?
Keep calm and carry on, basically.
I mean, as long as you keep smiling, I do not need much more.
I am happy as long as you are smiling, too.
It is kind of weird, you know?
You are the last person I see this year,
and the first person I see next year.
I hope it will be like that every year from now on.
